prompts: Create a large, ground-type Pokemon inspired by a hippo with sandy colors and a big mouth.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a hippo, has earthy tones, and can control sandstorms.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a massive hippo, with a distinct sandy habitat and powerful jaws.
Make a hippo-like Pokemon, featuring brown and gray colors, perfect for battling in desert terrains.
Imagine a Pokemon with a bulky body shape and a sandy color palette, ideal for ground battles.
Design a Pokemon that embodies a massive, sandy creature, with a strong presence in desert environments.
Show me a hippo-themed Pokemon that has unique features and a fierce combat style.
